content: striped snake by sarah ann thompson this snake is knit in the round beginning with the head end needles size us 5 double pointeds yarn cascade 220 four colors other materials needle for sewing in the yarn tails a safety pin-style marker and fiberfill stuffing dimensions length 49 inches body circumference 6 5 inches width of widest part of the head 4 5 inches head cast on 24 sts long-tail method leave tail for sewing the mouth closed join into a round 1-3 knit 4 k1 m1l k12 m1l k11 5-23 odd rounds knit 6 k1 m1l k13 m1l k12 8 k1 m1l k14 m1l k13 10 k1 m1l k15 m1l k14 12 k1 m1l k16 m1l k15 14 k1 m1l k17 m1l k16 16 k1 m1l k16 m1r k2 m1l k16 m1r k1 18 k1 m1l k18 m1r k2 m1l k18 m1r k1 20 k1 m1l k20 m1r k2 m1l k20 m1r k1 22 k1 m1l x2 k20 m1r k1 m1r k2 m1l k1 m1l k20 m1r k1 x2 24 k1 m1l x2 k24 m1r k1 m1r k2 m1l k1 m1l k24 m1r k1 x2 25-30 knit 31 ssk x2 k24 k2tog x2 ssk x2 k24 k2tog x2 32-36 even rounds knit 33 ssk x2 k20 k2tog x2 ssk x2 k20 k2tog x2 35 ssk x2 k16 k2tog x2 ssk x2 k16 k2tog x2 37 ssk x2 k12 k2tog x2 ssk x2 k12 k2tog x2 32 sts knit a few row to start the neck/body identify which sides of the snake s head should be the top and the bottom finish knitting in the round in the middle of the bottom of the snake so the color changes will take place there stuff the snake as you knit from here on eyes are embroidered on with the ends pulled back into the head cut 9 strands of yarn for the tongue knot braid and knot again put one knotted end in the mouth then use the tail from the beginning of the knitting to sew the mouth closed and the tongue secured in stripes 2 rounds black 4 rounds yellow 1 round black 9 rounds red 1 round black 4 rounds yellow 2 rounds black 20 rounds blue knit desired length of body tail 1-5 knit 6 k6 ssk k2tog k12 ssk k2tog k6 7-11 knit 12 k5 ssk k2tog k10 ssk k2tog k5 13-17 knit 18 k4 ssk k2tog k8 ssk k2tog k4 19-23 knit 24 k3 ssk k2tog k6 ssk k2tog k3 25-29 knit 30 k2 ssk k2tog k4 ssk k2tog k2 31-33 knit 34 k1 ssk k2tog k2 ssk k2tog k1 35 knit cut yarn thread through stitches and close pull yarn into the snake
